page.title: 06ENERGY + HOBBIES IN STURTON
page.content: {ENERGY AN UNDERGROUND{OIL LINE,}OWNED BY THE MINISTRY OF DEFENCE,DISSECTS THE AREA. THE LINE RUNS FROM{MISTERTON}TO {SCAMPTON}FOR THE USE OF THE R.A.F. STATION.{DOMESTIC ELECTRICITY}IS FED INTO THE AREA FROM{PYLONS}AND IS DISTRIBUTED VIA{SUB-STATIONS}WHICH REDUCE THE VOLTAGE. {HOBBIES NO ART OR CRAFT IS CARRIED OUT ON A COMMERCIAL BASIS. NUMEROUS HOBBIES ARE UNDERTAKEN:-{NEEDLECRAFT}WHICH INCLUDES{PATCHWORK,CANVASWORK,TATTING, {TAPESTRY, CROCHET}AND{EMBROIDERY; {SPINNING AND WEAVING;PAINTING & {SKETCHING;}THE KEEPING OF{BEES,FISH & {BIRDS;MODEL TRAINS;SHORT WAVE RADIO; {PHOTOGRAPHY;}COLLECTING AND RESTORING OF{VINTAGE VEHICLES AND ANTIQUES INCLUDING{FURNITURE;PHILATELY; {FLOWERCRAFT AND GARDENING.
